thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Stephen and Katherine
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Stephen and Katherine

author: Stephen and Katherine
title: Stephen and Katherine
text:
We had a fantastic time on the boat in the Galapagos. It was everything we had hoped for, amazing scenery, lots of animals and everything on the boat including the crew and guide was really well organised. We had a great tour group and met some really interesting and friendly people.
We were a bit disappointed with the arrangements in Quito; the hotel was not great for our travel purposes (10+ minute walk to restaurants, no laundry service at hotel, not walking distance to Old Town, etc) and if staying in Quito before or after the tour we would recommend making other arrangements.
